attributes.action: Hold a referendum to allow the people to decide how we leave the EU
attributes.additional_details: The government and parliament have been trying without success to agree on how to leave the EU. This petition calls on the government to pass the decision on to the people of the United Kingdom by holding a referendum with only options that support the original referendum result of leaving the EU.
attributes.background:
We ask the government to hold a referendum on how to leave the EU only presenting choices that would be accepted by the EU without some form of renegotiation:

a) to leave without a deal (No Deal)
b) to leave with the existing deal as negotiated by the Prime Minister and government with the EU.
